attributes.action: ban Razorlight from headlining The Carling Weekend Festival 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

Please see it in your powers to contact Mean Fiddler and inform them that you wish Razorlight to be taken off the Main Stage for the Carling Weekend Festival. They are an not very band and no one will enjoy watching them.  We the people suggest they be replaced by Rage Against the Machine or Tool.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
